page.title: 02Living Around Ore
page.content: I live in the country near Ore village. I have lived here all my life . There are fields at the back of our house and across the lane . We often go for walks in the woods nearby. We had trouble with a man who wanted to have a caravan park in the woods but he did not succeed. I like living here but I think it would be better if we had a general store nearby ,as it is nearly a mile to the village.I think the area around Ore and Hastings in general is quite a good place to have a holiday but it is untidy.Everywhere you go there is litter.{(by Vicky) On the Broomgrove Estate,where I live ,there is smashed glass from bottles ,sweet wrappers ,and litter from fish and chip shops. { {
